title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package' 2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3. Select xxx as destination5.
OB: When trying to copy a package in the Eclipse IDE, the destination package is not correctly identified.
EB: The copied package should be placed in the package 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new project named xxx. 
2. In the package viewer, select a package in project A. 
3. From the context menu, choose 'copy'.
